/** * Method for smelting 5 ores into bars */ public void smelt5(int ore, int ore2, int reqlvl, int xp, int bar) { smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); } /** * Method for smelting 10 ores into bars */ public void smelt10(int ore, int ore2, int reqlvl, int xp, int bar) { smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar); }

item.title: Euthymia skills
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

As some of you may know im working on a server called euthymia and i though i would share
the skills, please remember that those were wrote by me and those are to “Fit” my server needs.
With nothing else to say we may start with

The firemaking class

package server.euthymia.jugador.habilidades;

import server.Server;
import server.euthymia.jugador.Client;
import server.euthymia.jugador.PlayerHandler;
import task.*;

/**
 * 
 * @author ART/Strucker/mr boogie
 * Basic firemaking class
 *
 */
public class Firemaking {

	

	Client c;

	/*
	 * The constrctor
	 */
	public Firemaking(Client c) {
		this.c = c;
	}

	
	/*
	 * Have we lit the fire yet?
	 */
	public boolean litFire;

        /*
	 *checks if player has level, basically does the checks and	
	 *spawns an unlit log, also it makes us not move.
	 */
	public void preLit(int lvl, int xp, int log) {
		if (c.playerLevel[11] >= lvl) {
			c.toX = c.absX;
			c.toY = c.absY;
			c.addSkillXP(xp, 11);
			c.deleteItem(log, 1);
			// c.setAnimation(733);
			c.GlobalObjects.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY, 309, 0, 10);
			c.canMove = false;
			lit();
		} else {
		}
	}
		
	/*
	 *So here appears he fire, and allow us to move
	 */
	public void lit() {
		Server.getTaskScheduler().schedule(new Task(2, true) {
			private int count = 1;

			@Override
			protected void execute() {

				if (count > 0) {
					PlayerHandler.messageToAll = count + "...";
					count--;
				} else {
					c.GlobalObjects.deletethatobject(c.absX, c.absY);
					c.GlobalObjects.makeGlobalObject(c.absX, c.absY, 2732, 0, 10);
					c.canMove = true;
					litFire = true;
					stop();

				}
			}
		});
	}

	/*
 	 *This method is just called in the needed packet.
	 */
	public void litAll(int itemUsed, int useWith){
		  if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511)) {
           preLit(1, 200, 1511);
          }

          if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1521)) {
           preLit(15, 220, 1521);
          }

          if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1519)) {
           preLit(30, 250, 1519);
          }

          if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1517)) {
           preLit(30, 290,1517);
          }

          if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1513)) {
           preLit(30, 350, 1513);
          }

          if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1515)) {
           preLit(30, 510, 1515);
          }

	}
}

its documented kinda, if you have any positive comments or questions reply
The smelting class, only contains smelting

[code=java]/**

  • Smelting handler
  • @author Arthur98 - strucker
    */
    package server.euthymia.jugador.habilidades;

import server.Server;
import server.;
import server.euthymia.jugador.;
public class SmeltingHandler {

Client c;

public SmeltingHandler(Client client) {
	this.c = client;
}

public SmeltingHandler() {

}

/**
 * Smelting interface
 */
public void sendSmelting() {
	c.sendFrame164(2400);
	c.sendFrame246(2405, 200, 2349);
	c.sendFrame246(2406, 200, 2351);
	c.sendFrame246(2408, 200, 2355);
	c.sendFrame246(2409, 200, 2353);
	c.sendFrame246(2410, 200, 2357);
	c.sendFrame246(2411, 200, 2359);
	c.sendFrame246(2412, 200, 2361);
	c.sendFrame246(2413, 200, 2363);
}

/**
 * Smelting base method for smelting one bar//if(Misc.random(1) == 0) {http://pastebin.com/QpzHHYyj
 */
public void smelt(int ore, int ore2, int reqlvl, int xp, int bar) {
	c.closeInterface();
	if (c.playerHasItem(ore, 1) && c.playerHasItem(ore2, 1)
			&& c.playerLevel[13] >= reqlvl) {
		c.deleteItem(ore, 1);
		c.deleteItem(ore2, 1);
		c.addItem(bar, 1);
		c.sM("You make a bar.");
		c.setAnimation(899);
		c.addSkillXP(xp, 13);
	} else {
		if (c.playerLevel[13] < reqlvl) {
			c.sM("You dont have the required level to smelt this bar");
		}
	}
}

/**
 * Method for smelting 5 ores into bars
 */
public void smelt5(int ore, int ore2, int reqlvl, int xp, int bar) {
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
}
/**
 * Method for smelting 10 ores into bars
 */
public void smelt10(int ore, int ore2, int reqlvl, int xp, int bar) {
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
	smelt(ore, ore2, reqlvl, xp, bar);
}

/**
 * 
 * just random shit here.
 * misc methods etc.
 */
public void deletethat4(int id, int quanity) {
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
}

public void deletethat3(int id, int quanity) {
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
}

public void deletethat2(int id, int quanity) {
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
	c.deleteItem(id, quanity);
}

public void shortCut(int a){
	switch(a) {
	/**
	 * Handles Smelting 1 Bar action buttons * ore ore lvl xp bar
	 */
	case 15147:
		smelt(436, 438, 1, 35, 2349); // bronze
		break;
	case 15151:
		smelt(440, 440, 10, 55, 2351); // iron
		break;
	case 15159:
		smelt(440, 453, 19, 75, 2353); // steel
		break;
	case 29017:
		smelt(447, 453, 55, 85, 2359); // mithril
		break;
	case 29026:
		smelt(449, 453, 65, 95, 2361); // adamantite
		break;
	case 29022:
		smelt(451, 453, 80, 110, 2363); // runite
		break;

	/**
	 * End of Smelting 1 * Start of smelting 5
	 */
	case 15146:
		smelt5(436, 438, 1, 35, 2349); //bronze
		break;
	case 15150:
		smelt5(440, 440, 10, 55, 2351); // iron
		break;	
	case 15158:	
		smelt5(440, 453, 19, 75, 2353); // steel
		break;
	case 29025:
		smelt5(447, 453, 22, 85, 2359); // mithril
		break;
	case 29016:
		smelt5(449, 453, 65, 95, 2361); // adamantite
		break;
	case 29020:
		smelt5(451, 453, 80, 110, 2363); // runite
		break;
		
	/*
	 * end of smelting 5 start of smelting 10
	 */
	case 10247:
		smelt10(436, 438, 1, 35, 2349); //bronze
		break;
	case 15149:
		smelt10(440, 440, 10, 55, 2351); // iron
		break;
	case 15157:
		smelt10(440, 453, 19, 75, 2353); // steel
		break;
	case 24253:
		smelt10(447, 453, 22, 85, 2359); // mithril
		break;
	case 29019:
		smelt10(449, 453, 65, 95, 2361); // adamantite
		break;
	case 29024:
		smelt10(451, 453, 80, 110, 2363); // runite
		break;
		/*
		 * end of smelting 10 bars
		 */
}}

}[/code]

and here are some fletching methods that delta already had but i moved them

[code=java]package server.euthymia.jugador.habilidades;

import server.euthymia.jugador.*;
/**
*

  • @author ART

*/
public class Fletching {

Client c;

/*
 * The constructor
 */
public Fletching(Client Client){
	this.c = Client;
}

public void fletchBow() {
	if (c.fletchAmount < 1) {
		c.resetAction();
		return;
	}
	c.fletchAmount--;
	c.closeInterface();
	c.IsBanking = false;
	c.pEmote = 885;
	c.updateRequired = true;
	c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	if (c.playerHasItem(c.logs[c.fletchLog])) {
		c.deleteItem(c.logs[c.fletchLog], 1);
		c.addItem(c.fletchId, 1);
		c.addSkillXP(c.fletchExp, c.playerFletching);
	} else {
		c.resetAction();
	}
}

public void fletchBow(boolean shortBow, int amount) {
	c.closeInterface();
	if (shortBow) {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= c.shortreq[c.fletchLog]) {
			c.fletchId = c.shortbows[c.fletchLog];
			c.fletchExp = c.shortexp[c.fletchLog];
		} else {
			c.sM("You need " + c.shortreq[c.fletchLog] + " to fletch this.");
			c.resetAction();
		}
	} else {
		if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] >= c.longreq[c.fletchLog]) {
			c.fletchId = c.longbows[c.fletchLog];
			c.fletchExp = c.longexp[c.fletchLog];
		} else {
			c.sM("You need " + c.longreq[c.fletchLog] + " to fletch this.");
			c.resetAction();
		}
	}
	c.fletching = true;
	c.fletchAmount = amount;
}
public void fletchAllFlechtable(int itemUsed, int otherItem){
	if (((itemUsed == 5605) || (otherItem == 5605))
			&& ((itemUsed == 1511) || (otherItem == 1511))) {
		c.shafting = true;
		
	}
	int[] heads = { 39, 40, 41, 42, 43, 44 };
	int[] arrows = { 882, 884, 886, 888, 890, 892 };
	int[] required = { 1, 5, 25, 50, 70, 85 };
	for (int h = 0; h < heads.length; h++) {
		if (c.playerHasItem(heads[h], 15) && c.playerHasItem(53, 15)
				&& ((itemUsed == heads[h]) || (otherItem == heads[h]))
				&& ((itemUsed == 53) || (otherItem == 53))) {
			if (c.playerLevel[c.playerFletching] < required[h]) {
				c.sM("You need " + required[h]
						+ " fletching to fletch this.");
				break;
			}
			c.deleteItem(heads[h], 15);
			c.deleteItem(53, 15);
			c.addItem(arrows[h], 15);
			c.addSkillXP(200, c.playerFletching);
			
			break;
		}
	}
	// regular, oak, maple, willow, yew, magic?
	for (int id = 0; id < c.logs.length; id++) {
		if (((itemUsed == c.logs[id]) || (otherItem == c.logs[id]))
				&& ((itemUsed == 5605) || (otherItem == 5605))) {
			// emote 885 (funny=3129)
			c.dialog = true;
			c.dialogInterface = 2459;
			c.dialogId = 1;
			c.fletchLog = id;
			c.sendFrame126("Select a bow", 8879);
			c.sendFrame246(8870, 250, c.longbows[id]); // right picture
			c.sendFrame246(8869, 250, c.shortbows[id]); // left picture
			c.sendFrame126(c.getItemName(c.shortbows[id]), 8871);
			c.sendFrame126(c.getItemName(c.shortbows[id]), 8874);
			c.sendFrame126(c.getItemName(c.longbows[id]), 8878);
			c.sendFrame126(c.getItemName(c.longbows[id]), 8875);
			c.sendFrame164(8866);
			
			break;
		}
	}
	for (int id1 = 0; id1 < c.shortbow.length; id1++) {
		if (((itemUsed == c.shortbows[id1]) || (otherItem == c.shortbows[id1]))
				&& ((itemUsed == 1777) || (otherItem == 1777))) {
			c.deleteItem(c.shortbows[id1], 1);
			c.deleteItem(1777, 1);
			c.addItem(c.shortbow[id1], 1);
			c.addSkillXP(280, 9);
			
		}
	}
	for (int b2 = 0; b2 < c.shortbow.length; b2++) {
		if (((itemUsed == c.longbows[b2]) || (otherItem == c.longbows[b2]))
				&& ((itemUsed == 1777) || (otherItem == 1777))) {
			c.deleteItem(c.longbows[b2], 1);
			c.deleteItem(1777, 1);
			c.addItem(c.longbow[b2], 1);
			c.addSkillXP(280, 9);
			
		}
	}
	if (((itemUsed == 5605) || (otherItem == 5605))
			&& ((itemUsed == 771) || (otherItem == 771))) {
		if (c.playerLevel[9] >= 32) {
			c.deleteItem(771, 1);
			c.addItem(772, 1);
			c.setAnimation(885);
		} else
			c.sM("You need at least 32 fletching to fletch this.");
	}
}
public void shaft() {
	c.closeInterface();
	if (c.playerHasItem(1511)) {
		if (c.playerHasItem(-1)) {
			c.deleteItem(1511, 1);
			c.addItem(52, 15);
			c.addSkillXP(150, c.playerFletching);
		} else {
			c.sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
			c.resetAction();
		}
	} else {
		c.resetAction();
	}
}

}[/code]

I will be updating this when i finish more skills…

Read full topic
